metadata.title: CVE-2021-44962 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: An out-of-bounds read vulnerability exists in the GCode::extrude()functionality of Slic3r libslic3r 1.3.0 and Master Commit b1a5500. Aspecially crafted stl file could lead to information disclosure. Anattacker can provide a malicious file to trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: slic3r package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
